segments.text: Be quick . Put our bags in the deposit box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We got a problem . The deposit boxes are all full . We should have come earlier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I told you to hurry up a thousand times . You just put a deaf ear to it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you ? I didn't hear you . It was too noisy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I surely did ! Ask the customer service counter if we can deposit our stuff there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They say we can't . They don't look after customers ' stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's all your fault ! Now we can't get in shopping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , it's my fault . I'll stay here and look after our stuff . You can get in , shopping with Daniel and May .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That sounds like a good idea !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hey , don't forget to buy a suit for me .
segments.speaker: S2
